text: Muhammad Mizanuddin is a Bangladeshi academic. He served as the 22nd Vice- chancellor of Rajshahi University since March 20, 2013. ==Education and career== Mizanuddin passed matriculation exam in 1969 and intermediate exam in 1972. He completed his bachelor's and master's from University of Rajshahi in 1976 and 1978 respectively. He earned another master's from University of Alberta in 1983. In 1993, he obtained his Ph.D. from Jawaharlal Nehru University, Delhi in 1993. ==References== Category:Living people Category:University of Rajshahi alumni Category:University of Rajshahi faculty Category:University of Alberta alumni Category:Jawaharlal Nehru University alumni Category:Vice-Chancellors of the University of Rajshahi Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Muhammad Mizanuddin
